summary: Female mage of beauty at your service.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first time uploading a follower and I am a noob at the Creation Kit, so bear with me. Following an online tutorial, I made my character into a follower. She carries lightning attack spells and specializes in attack magic. She is at Level 100 and invincible. She is located in Winterhold in The Frozen Hearth.

To make Michelle look like she does in the photo, the following mods are required:
CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
Younger Breton Females - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8741&searchtext=younger+breton+females
Cute Eyes - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13076
All In One Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17704
Luscious Faces - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15861
ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Ashara Romantic Outfit (not required) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5577

Her appearance will vary depending on your installed mods, though.
author: banzaigtv

files.name: Breton Follower Michelle - invincible version
files.changelogHtml: Michelle is now at Level 100 and is invulnerable to attacks.
